you-do-not-have-sufficient-permissions: Anda tidak mempunyai kebenaran untuk mengakses halaman ini, sila hubungi pentadbir.
change-your-language-and-region-settings: Tukar tetapan bahasa dan kawasan anda.
title: Tajuk
this-field-can-help-describe-the-content: Huraikan secara ringkas kandungan ini. Tidak lebih daripada 150 aksara.
drag-and-drop-or-click-here: Seret dan lepaskan atau klik di sini
click-on-the-image-for-options: Click on the image for options.
this-field-is-used-when-you-order-the-co: This field is used when you order the content by position.
name: Nama
to-schedule-the-page-select-the-date-and: To schedule the page select the date and time.
use-this-field-to-name-your-site: Gunakan medan ini untuk namakan laman web anda. Ianya akan dipaparkan di atas setiap halaman laman web anda.
use-this-field-to-add-a-catchy-phrase: Gunakan medan ini untuk tambahkan frasa menarik di laman web anda.
you-can-add-a-site-description-to-provid: Anda boleh gunakan ini sebagai biografi pendek atau perihal laman web anda.
you-can-add-a-small-text-on-the-bottom: Anda boleh tambahkan teks kecil di bawah setiap halaman. Contohnya: hak cipta, pemilik, tarikh, dll.
emails-will-be-sent-from-this-address: E-mel akan dikirim oleh alamat ini.
select-a-timezone-for-a-correct: Pilih zon masa yang betul untuk paparan tarikh dan masa yang tepat.
author: Pengarang
create-a-new-page-for-your-site: Create a new page for your site
create-a-new-category-to-organize-your-c: Create a new category to organize your content
confirm-delete-this-action-cannot-be-und: Sahkan pembuangan? Tindakan ini tidak boleh dibatalkan.
do-you-want-to-disable-the-user: Do you want to disable the user ?
you-can-change-this-field-when-save-the-: You can change this field when save the current changes.
invite-a-friend-to-collaborate-on-your-s: Invite a friend to collaborate on your site
number-of-items-to-show-per-page: Number of items to show per page.
edit-or-delete-content-from-your-site: Edit or delete content from your site
order-the-content-by-position-to-build-a: Order the content by position to build a Website or order the content by date to build a Blog.
page-not-found-content: Hey! look like the page doesn't exist.
returning-page-when-the-page-doesnt-exis: Returning page when the page doesn't exist, leave it blank if you want to returns a default message.
returning-page-for-the-main-page: Returning page for the main page, leave it blank if you want to show all the pages on the main page.
full-url-of-your-site: Full URL of your site. Complete with the protocol HTTP or HTTPS (only if you have enabled SSL on your server).
with-the-locales-you-can-set-the-regiona: With the locales, you can set the regional user interface, such as the dates in your language. The locales need to be installed on your system.
complete-the-form-choose-a-password-for-: Lengkapkan borang di bawah, pilih kata laluan untuk pengguna « admin »
whats-next: Apa yang anda boleh lakukan seterusnya?
username-or-password-incorrect: Nama pengguna atau kata laluan tidak betul
chat-with-developers-and-users-on-gitter: Sembang dengan pembangun dan pengguna di [Gitter](https://gitter.im/dignajar/bludit)
this-is-a-brief-description-of-yourself-: Ini ialah perihal ringkas anda atau laman web anda. Untuk mengubahnya, pergi ke Panel Pentadbir -> Tetapan -> Pemalam dan tetapkan tatarajah pemalam "About".
recommended-for-recovery-password-and-no: Recommended for recovery password and notifications.
this-token-is-similar-to-your-password-y: This token is similar to your password, you should not share it.
label: Label
this-title-is-almost-always-used-in-the-: This title is almost always used in the sidebar of the site.
password-must-be-at-least-6-characters-l: Kata laluan perlu mempunyai sekurang-kurangnya 6 aksara
installer-page-about-content: The about page is an important and powerful for potential clients and partners. For those who wonder who is behind the website, your About page is the first source of information.
create-a-new-category-to-organize-your-p: Create a new category to organize your pages
edit-or-delete-pages-from-your-site: Edit or delete pages from your site
this-field-is-used-when-you-order-the-pa: This field is used when you order the pages by position.
